root: ^Listen carefully at the young kid voice in you head.

c-0: ^I'm Andy and you are my friend ! I found you in a dupster 2 weeks ago.
^I repaired you and I think you are alive now.
^Look, I want you to do something for me... I... My mom is ill and nobody wants to pay for her traitment.
^I... I need to save her, and I need you to do it.
^Sure, if I can be of any service, I'll do my best.
^Amazing ! Let's try to familiarize you with what you'll have to do in order to save my mum.
^Ok ! What do I have to do ?
^I have reprogrammed you to be stealthy, so first, let's test if you can grab this bottle on the table. Go ahead !
